/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is flanked by lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. A blue truck and a white car can be seen driving on the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft light over the entire scene. The colors in the image are predominantly green and gray, reflecting the blend of urban and natural elements.
